page.title: 15A Typical Child's Day.
page.content: I wake at 7.30 a.m. and make my own breakfast which is usually sphagetti on toast.After cleaning my teeth I get changed into my school uniform.At 8.10 a.m. I tidy my bedroom and collect my coat and go to my Nan's because my Mum goes to work. I stay there until 8.45 a.m. then I leave for school .When we go into class we have registration and assembly ,we sing 2 hymns .In the morning we split into groups for mathematics ,spellings and english work.I donot stay for school lunch but I'm back early ready to start at 1.0 p.m.Sometimes we do topic work or games or watch a t.v. programme .Mr. Howlett gives us reading times in the class or the school library .Just before 3.0 p.m. Mr.Howlett reads a story and we say prayers at the close of lessons.Clubs are held until about 3.30 p.m. When I
